name: James Russell
text: I caught these guys gauging prices on a product. I also know for a fact they cheat the state out of sales tax by not registering the cash into cash register. I do not understand why we give them loans at 5% and stand by while they cheat and steal from us. If you think I am lying pay attention to owner when you buy something behind counter. He owns 3 -4 stores and have seen him running two registers at once on numerous times. He also does not pay time in a half to host employees. 2016 law was passed that everyone making vfc under 46000 has to be paid time and a half after forty. Regardless.

name: Jellybean rea
text: Awesome experience, lady was so very polite and patient!! Gas prices are great, beverages and everything. I love going to this place <3

name: Cory Swindle
text: Very nice lady, always polite! Great prices for gas and beverages, all around a wonderful experience!!

name: Matthew Jackson
text: My wife buys her smokes here and the people here are very friendly to everyone!

name: Jason Latham
text: Employees and owners are very friendly
